ISSUE.TITLE: delete account - http 400
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I've setup Drone to sync against Bitbucket. When I click the main menu (top left) and select 'Users' I see a single user which is my Bitbucket account. When I click on that, I see on the user edit screen a button labelled 'Delete Account'. Clicking that results in a DELETE request to http://mydrone/api/users/bitbucket.org/<user> which returns HTTP 400 response. I'm guessing this is left-over code from when Drone supported local user accounts?
